translations: [昆] 胭脂虫；[染料] 胭脂虫红

sentences.sentence: Cochineal insects are used widely in making food, cosmetic and medicine.
sentences.translation: 胭脂虫可生产胭脂红，现广泛用于食品、化妆品及药品等行业。

sentences.sentence: Carmine produced from cochineal has been used widely in food, cosmetics and pharmaceutics industry.
sentences.translation: 用胭脂虫干体加工生产的胭脂红色素广泛地应用于食品、化妆品、制药业。

sentences.sentence: Carmine can also be identified on food labels as Crimson Lake, Cochineal, Natural Red 4, C.I. 75470 or E120.
sentences.translation: 胭脂红也可以在食品标签上称为深红湖、胭脂虫红、天然红色4、C.I . 75470或者E120。
